title: Ticket #7147: File Transfer upload time stats are wrong
description: The FileTransfer object's statistics for the upload side of a transfer have incorrect time values. The code is using the download timestamps, which would be for a previous transfer in the other direction, if any.
remarks:
2019-Aug-06 14:12:14 by coatsworth:
CODE REVIEW

Looks good to me. Docs are already done, so I'm giving this back to Jaime and marking it resolved.
